Great flick - witty, funny, and did not get enough adverisments
Croatian subs ? Croatian ? c'mon ! no english or spanish ?
SVids - As with all of our releases, English subtitles are included. What do you expect, that we add subtitles for every spoken language worldwide, when your own uploads have no subtitles at all?

A bleeding ISO? Are you kidding?
...skipping. Thanks anyway.
ashmatash - Skip quietly next time. Noone on TPB needs to know your life history.
